name: list_kube_contexts
description: List available kubectl contexts from the mounted kubeconfig

name: select_kube_context
description: Select the Kubernetes context for all subsequent operations. Context is held in memory only â€” does not mutate kubeconfig.

arguments.name: context
arguments.description: Name of the kubectl context to use

name: flux_dryrun
description: Validate FluxCD manifests with kubectl dry-run (client + server). Use before committing Flux YAML to prevent GitOps reconciliation failures.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: Path to YAML file or directory containing manifests

name: flux_check
description: Run 'flux check' to verify Flux installation and components health.

name: flux_status
description: Get Flux reconciliation status for all resources across namespaces.

name: kustomize_dryrun
description: Validate Kustomize overlay by building and running kubectl dry-run (client + server).

name: helm_dryrun
description: Validate Helm chart by rendering and running kubectl dry-run (client + server).

arguments.name: release_name
arguments.description: Release name for helm template (default: release-name)

name: kubeconform_validate
description: Validate Kubernetes manifests against JSON schemas offline using kubeconform. No cluster connection needed.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: Path to YAML file or directory containing manifests

arguments.name: kubernetes_version
arguments.description: Kubernetes version for schema lookup (e.g. 1.29.0). Default: master

arguments.name: strict
arguments.description: Reject additional properties not in the schema (default: false)

name: yaml_validate
description: Validate YAML syntax of Kubernetes manifest files. Catches syntax errors, duplicate keys, and tab indentation. Use as a first-pass check before kubeconform or dry-run. No cluster connection needed.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: Path to YAML file or directory containing YAML files

name: argocd_app_list
description: List all ArgoCD applications with sync and health status. Uses --core mode (kubeconfig only, no ArgoCD server auth needed).

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: Namespace where ArgoCD Application CRs live (optional). Common values: 'argocd', 'argo-cd'

name: argocd_app_get
description: Get detailed status of a single ArgoCD application including sync/health status, conditions, and resource statuses. Uses --core mode (kubeconfig only, no ArgoCD server auth needed).

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: Namespace where the Application CR lives (optional). Common values: 'argocd', 'argo-cd'

name: argocd_app_diff
description: Show diff between live and desired state of an ArgoCD application. Returns unified diff output showing what would change on sync. Uses --core mode (kubeconfig only, no ArgoCD server auth needed).

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: Namespace where the Application CR lives (optional). Common values: 'argocd', 'argo-cd'
